article.title: Notification obligation regarding rectification or erasure of personal data or restriction of processing

content.description: The controller shall communicate any rectification or erasure of personal data or restriction of processing carried out in accordance with Article 16, Article 17(1) and Article 18 to each recipient to whom the personal data have been disclosed, unless this proves impossible or involves disproportionate effort.

requirements.condition: in accordance with Article 16, Article 17(1) and Article 18

requirements.type: rectification or erasure or restriction of processing

requirements.exception: unless this proves impossible or involves disproportionate effort

data_subject.detail: about those recipients if the data subject requests it
